Morgan, you are obviously very strongly gifted in a psychic sense. These entities are naturally drawn to you. I don't think Angie is a problem either. Many spirits hang around us for various reasons. We have a woman in our home right now who loves kids and wants to always protect them. In fact, she has before when something else came to visit that doesn't belong here. I think there is something else in your parent's house and that Angie has attached bc she originally felt a connection to you and has hung around in order to protect you from it.
My advice is to learn about your gifts and seek knowledge on how to protect yourself from the things that would harm you. And you're not at all crazy. Most truly gifted people, when they accept their gifts instead of avoiding them (as your Mom does since the ghosts obviously are drawn to her too), become nonchalant as they become used to all of the "weird" stuff and it becomes more normal.
Finally, trust your instincts. You are doing fine with telling what is okay and what isn't.
My advice for you is... Two words GET OUT
